short_summary: Request for Proposal for specialized vehicle systems and components
description: Airfield ground lighting equipmentBuildings and equipment supplies. Contract for airfield ground lighting equipment and ground lighting support equipment, illumination panels, gates/doors brooms, movement areas, taxipaths and aprons.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Einsa VAP-40E Aerial Loader Battery Assembly
## Project Details
- **Project Title (English)**: Einsa VAP-40E aerial loader battery assembly
- **Project Title (French)**: Chargeur aérien batterie solaire VAP-40E de Einsa
- **Reference Number**: cb-108-29842146
- **Amendment Number**: 10
- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-249346/A
- **Publication Date**: 3 October 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: 14 November 2023, 14:00:00
- **Contract Start Date**: 1 November 2023
- **Contract End Date**: 9 August 2024
## Tender Status
- The tender is now cancelled.

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is tendering for the procurement of Einsa VAP-40E aerial loader battery assemblies under the reference number W8486-249346/A.

The bid consists of the following two items:

1.  Eight (8) battery assemblies with a part number of 40 669 301, National Stock Number (NSN) 20-A10-6878, and North Atlantic Treaty Organization Stock (NATO) Code D7505 to be delivered to the 25 Depot d’approvisionnement de l’aéronautique (DAFC) Montreal.
2.  Eight (8) battery assemblies with a part number of 40 669 301, NSN 20-A10-6878, and NATO Code D7505 to be delivered to the 7 Depot d’approvisionnement de Edmonton (DAFC).

The Crown may choose to enter into discussions with suppliers at any time to negotiate a contract for the procurement of these items.

Vendor Information
- **Name**: Department of National Defence
- **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2
- **Phone**: (343) 552-4285
- **Email**: [tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca)
- **Fax**: Nil
## Delivery Location

The delivery locations for the above-mentioned items are as follows:

- 25 DAFC Montreal
- 7 DAFC Edmonton

## Evaluation Criteria

- The vendor with the lowest price will be selected.

## Options
- Option 1: The
